column4: Afternoon All - Im trying to get DVD`s to play on my ubuntu install. I have followed the guide (https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats) but when i open VNC it will play the warning about copywright on the DVD then nothing. Any ideas?
I'm no expert, but for some reason playing DVDs usually works after a reboot. I don't know why.
Maybe some zone thing or something
Thanks man - not sure why i didnt try that already =/ Back in a moment :)
